topic.title: Reviewer
topic.section:
The Reviewer is selected by the Acquisitions Editor to review a submission. Reviewers are asked to submit reviews to the press's web site (although some presses opt for an email review policy) and are able to upload attachments for the use of the Editor and Author. Reviewers may be rated by Acquisitions Editors, again depending on the policies for this press.

More information can be found {help_topic key="editorial.reviewersRole" text="here"}.
